name: Tenshukaku
description: When the Action Phase begins: If you have 5 different kinds of Elemental Die, create 1 Omni Element.
descriptionraw: <color=#FFFFFFFF>When the Action Phase begins:</color> If you have 5 different kinds of Elemental Die, create 1 $[K411].
descriptionreplaced: <color=#FFFFFFFF>When the Action Phase begins:</color> If you have 5 different kinds of Elemental Die, create 1 <color=#FFFFFFFF>{SPRITE_PRESET#1111}Omni Element</color>.
storytext: "What matters is that I tread the path of eternity on my people's behalf."
